mapper.insert:
insert into paper
paperId,
paperTitle,
paperGroupId,
paperNote,
paperTime,
subjectId,
questionRatio
#{paperid},

mapper.update:
update paper
paperTitle = #{papertitle},
paperGroupId = #{papergroupid},
paperNote = #{papernote},
paperTime = #{papertime},
subjectId = #{subjectid},
questionRatio = #{questionratio}
where paperId = #{paperid}
